testcase.brief: (IxPort: CoF=3) Check known unicast packets forwarding
testcase.description:
Topology to use PC1++++++ Switch+++++++PC2 + + PC3
Description Check known unicast packets forwarding Platform Dependence Chesapeake Pre-condition ? PC1,PC2,PC3 connect to switch port1,port2,port3 ? PC1,PC2,PC3 are in same vlan 10 Test procedure Dynamic unicast mac entries 1. PC1 send frames to switch 2. PC2 send frames to switch 3. PC3 send frames to switch 4. Check switch FDB table entries for PC1,PC2,PC3 Result1 5. PC1 send unicast (known) to PC2 Result2 PC1ping PC2 6. PC1 send unicast(known) to PC3 Result3 PC1 ping PC3 7. PC2 send unicast(known) to PC3 Result4
Static unicast mac entries 8. Add a static unicast mac entry for port2 [0011-1111-1111, vlan 10, port2] 9. Setf PC2,PC3 to capture frames 10. PC1 send frames with dst mac 0011-1111-111 Result5 Expect result Result1: FDB table has mac entries for port1,port2,port3 [PC1 mac, vlan 10, port1] [PC2 mac, vlan 10, port2] [PC3 mac, vlan 10, port3] Result2: PC1 ping PC2 success, PC2 can receive the icmp packets sent from PC1; PC3 don’t receive the icmp packets Result3: PC1 ping PC3 success, PC3 can receive the icmp packets sent from PC1; PC2 don’t receive the icmp packets Result4: PC2 ping PC3 success, PC3 can receive the icmp packets sent from PC2; PC1 don’t receive the icmp packets
Result5: PC2 can receive all the frames sent by PC1 with dst mac 0011-1111-1111; PC3 don’t receive the frames, because the the dst mac 0011-1111-1111 don’t learnt on port3

step.desc: configure 3 access ports in the same vlan
step.telnet: -v "vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface ${sw1.port1} switchport access vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface ${sw1.port2} switchport access vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface ${sw1.port3} switchport access vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "show vlan brief" -v "show vlan summary" -v "show vlan id ${tb.vlan1}" -v "show mac-address-table all" -v "show interface"

step.desc: port1, port2 and port3 send pkts to let switch learn FDB entries
check FDB, mac entries are learned from the three ports
build stream, port1 sends pkt with src-mac ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.mac} to dst-mac ${sw1.port2.ixia_port.mac}
step.ssh:
-v ""
-v "stream_maintance -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -streamId all -maintanceOp disable" -v "stream_maintance -onePort ${sw1.port2.ixia_port} -streamId all -maintanceOp disable" -v "stream_maintance -onePort ${sw1.port3.ixia_port} -streamId all -maintanceOp disable"
-v "traffic_configure_eth2 -portListIn ${sw1.port1.ixia_port},${sw1.port2.ixia_port},${sw1.port3.ixia_port} -mac_dst ${sw1.port2.ixia_port.mac} -mac_src ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.mac} -eth2_protocol 0x0800" -v ""
-v "start_trans_getstats -txPortList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -rxPortList ${sw1.port2.ixia_port},${sw1.port3.ixia_port}" -v "" -v "check_equal_tx_with_rx -oneTxPort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -oneRxPort ${sw1.port2.ixia_port}" -v "" -v "check_equal_tx_with_rx -oneTxPort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -oneRxPort ${sw1.port3.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: check FDB,make sure the mac entries aren't changed
analyse statistics on rxport, only port2 received pkts
build stream, port1 sends pkt with src-mac ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.mac} to dst-mac ${sw1.port3.ixia_port.mac}
step.ssh:
-v ""
-v "stream_maintance -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -streamId all -maintanceOp disable" -v "stream_maintance -onePort ${sw1.port2.ixia_port} -streamId all -maintanceOp disable" -v "stream_maintance -onePort ${sw1.port3.ixia_port} -streamId all -maintanceOp disable"
-v "traffic_configure_eth2 -portListIn ${sw1.port1.ixia_port},${sw1.port2.ixia_port.mac},${sw1.port3.ixia_port} -mac_dst ${sw1.port3.ixia_port.mac} -mac_src ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.mac} -eth2_protocol 0x0800" -v ""
-v "start_trans_getstats -txPortList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -rxPortList ${sw1.port2.ixia_port},${sw1.port3.ixia_port}" -v "" -v "check_equal_tx_with_rx -oneTxPort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -oneRxPort ${sw1.port2.ixia_port}" -v "" -v "check_equal_tx_with_rx -oneTxPort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -oneRxPort ${sw1.port3.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: check FDB,make sure the mac entries aren't changed
analyse statistics on rxport, only port3 received pkts
build stream, port2 sends pkt with src-mac ${sw1.port2.ixia_port.mac} to dst-mac ${sw1.port3.ixia_port.mac}
step.ssh:
-v ""
-v "stream_maintance -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -streamId all -maintanceOp disable" -v "stream_maintance -onePort ${sw1.port2.ixia_port} -streamId all -maintanceOp disable" -v "stream_maintance -onePort ${sw1.port3.ixia_port} -streamId all -maintanceOp disable"
-v "traffic_configure_eth2 -portListIn ${sw1.port1.ixia_port},${sw1.port2.ixia_port},${sw1.port3.ixia_port} -mac_dst ${sw1.port3.ixia_port.mac} -mac_src ${sw1.port2.ixia_port.mac} -eth2_protocol 0x0800" -v ""
-v "start_trans_getstats -txPortList ${sw1.port2.ixia_port} -rxPortList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port},${sw1.port3.ixia_port}" -v "" -v "check_equal_tx_with_rx -oneTxPort ${sw1.port2.ixia_port} -oneRxPort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v "" -v "check_equal_tx_with_rx -oneTxPort ${sw1.port2.ixia_port} -oneRxPort ${sw1.port3.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: check FDB,make sure the mac entries aren't changed
analyse statistics on rxport, only port3 received pkts
clear the FDB entries on the three ports
step.telnet: -v "clear mac-address-table interface ${sw1.port1}" -v "clear mac-address-table interface ${sw1.port2}" -v "clear mac-address-table interface ${sw1.port3}" -v "show vlan brief" -v "show vlan summary" -v "show vlan id ${tb.vlan1}" -v "show mac-address-table all"

step.desc: build stream, port1 sends pkt with src-mac ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.mac} to dst-mac ${sw1.port2.ixia_port.mac}
step.ssh:
-v ""
-v "stream_maintance -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -streamId all -maintanceOp disable" -v "stream_maintance -onePort ${sw1.port2.ixia_port} -streamId all -maintanceOp disable" -v "stream_maintance -onePort ${sw1.port3.ixia_port} -streamId all -maintanceOp disable"
-v "traffic_configure_eth2 -portListIn ${sw1.port1.ixia_port},${sw1.port2.ixia_port},${sw1.port3.ixia_port} -mac_dst ${sw1.port2.ixia_port.mac} -mac_src ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.mac} -eth2_protocol 0x0800" -v ""
-v "start_trans_getstats -txPortList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -rxPortList ${sw1.port2.ixia_port},${sw1.port3.ixia_port}" -v "" -v "check_equal_tx_with_rx -oneTxPort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -oneRxPort ${sw1.port2.ixia_port}" -v "" -v "check_equal_tx_with_rx -oneTxPort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -oneRxPort ${sw1.port3.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: check FDB,make sure the mac entries aren't changed
analyse statistics on rxport, only port2 received pkts
